passive.description:
Gains 1 stack of Natural Armor every 5s, stacking up to 4
times. Each stack increases Damage Resistance by 8%. 1
stack is lost for each instance of damage taken.

basicAttacks.description:
[Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 80%] Magic Damage.

Throws an [Evil Seed] after 5 Basic Attacks.
Throws an Evil Seed at the target location, creating a
thorn zone that lasts 5s. The zone deals [Damage Rate:
40%] Magic Damage every second to up to 5 enemies and
reduces their Movement Speed by 25%.

Basic Attacks become [Soothing Mist].
Releases Soothing Mist in the target direction, dealing
[Damage Rate: 70%] Magic Damage to enemies hit, while
applying 1 stack of [Recovery] to allies.
[Recovery]: Restores HP every second for 12s, stacking up
to 3 times.
HP recovery at 1 | 2 | 3 stacks:
[Healing Rate: 10%] | [Healing Rate: 15%] | [Healing Rate:
20%]

Basic Attacks become [Healing Seed].
Throws a healing seed at the target location that blooms,
healing nearby allies for [Healing Rate: 55%] HP and
applying 1 stack of [Recovery]
[Recovery]: Restores HP every second for 12s, stacking up
to 3 times.
HP recovery at 1 | 2 | 3 stacks:
[Healing Rate: 10%] | [Healing Rate: 15%] | [Healing Rate:
20%]

commonSkills.description:
After a brief delay, creates an entangling zone lasting 4s.
Deals [Damage Rate: 90%] Magic Damage every second
and immobilizes enemies that enter for 1.5s.

Creates an energizing aura around the caster, lasting 5s.
Restores [Healing Rate: 39%] HP and 12 MP every second
to up to 10 nearby allies.

Applies Vitality Seeds to up to 5 nearby allies, healing for
[Healing Rate: 80%] HP and applying 1 stack of
[Recovery].
Vitality Seeds increase Cast Speed by 40% and
Attack Speed by 25% for 6s.
[Recovery]: Restores HP every second for 12s, stacking up
to 3 times
HP recovery at 1 | 2 | 3 stacks:
[Healing Rate: 10%] | [Healing Rate: 15%] | [Healing Rate: 20%]

Releases restorative energy at the target location, healing
allies. Healing amount increases based on target's
[Recovery] stacks.
[Recovery] stacks: 0|1 |2|3
Recovers HP: [Healing Rate: 75%] | [Healing Rate: 95%] |
[Healing Rate: 115%] | [Healing Rate: 135%]

Cleanses all Hard Control (Stun, Fear, Freeze, Knockup,
Petrify, Sleep), Silence, and 2 DoT effects on the caster
and up to 20 nearby allies. Also heals for [Healing Rate:
60%] HP, applies 1 stack of [Recovery], and prevents the
next 3 Hard Control or Silence effects. The effect lasts 4s.
Can be used while skills are disabled.
[Recovery]: Restores HP every second for 12s, stacking up
to 3 times.
HP recovery at 1 | 2 | 3 stacks
[Healing Rate: 10%] | [Healing Rate: 15%] | [Healing Rate: 20%]

skills.description:
Creates 3 explosions in the target area. Each explosion
deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage to players
([Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to mobs). The
caster is healed for [Healing Rate: 60%] HP if at least one
enemy is hit.

Grants Thorn Barrier to up to 5 nearby allies.
Thorn Barrier increases Damage Resistance by 20%, Cast Speed by 40% and
Attack Speed by 25% for 6s.
When taking direct damage, recovers [Healing Rate: 55%]
HP up to 6 times; also Slows the attacker by 25% for 3s.

Creates a Rain of Serenity at the target location for 8s.
Allies in the rain gain 25% Damage Resistance and
recover [Healing Rate: 25%] HP every second.
 Deals [Damage Rate: 50%] Magic Damage to enemies in the field every 1 second

Creates a Healing Bloom aura. Allies within gain 15%
increased healing. Consumes 3 MP every second to
restore [Healing Rate: 20%] HP to nearby allies

Launches Root Worms in the target direction. Upon
hitting an enemy target, it will bounce to other enemy
targets within 7 meters up to 9 times. Each target can be
hit a maximum of 3 times.
Each hit deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage
Stuns the target for 1s, and reduces damage dealt by 20% for 9s.

Heals all allies hit for [Healing Rate: 100%], cleansing all
control effects and 5 DoT stacks. Also grants immunity to
DoTs and increases healing received by 35% for 6s.

Plants a Divine Rootfall that lasts 20s. After 1s, the tree
matures and restores [Healing Rate: 20%] HP every
second to nearby allies. When enemies cast skills in
range, it shoots sleep seeds that deal [Damage Rate:
200%] Magic Damage and inflict Sleep for 2.5s.
The tree is destroyed after taking 10 Basic Attack hits
